ModMetaData.name: LMC026.航海
ModMetaData.author: Silt
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Allows you to travel through water with your caravan. It'll take you 6x longer than most biomes (forest, desert, et cetera). 允许你的远征队横过海洋，但是会花费比大多数地貌（如森林，沙漠等）多6倍的时间。 To change stats, go to \Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\294100\1469326540\Patches, open Patch.xml and change anything you want. 要改变所花费的时间，打开Patches\Patch.xml修改movementDifficulty项数值。 汉化：jxb12306
